name: Hangman Ultimate Plus
description:
Hangman classic game never been better, prepare for a game that will bring you more than any other available hangman app on the Appstore.The whole user interface is re-made to take advantage of the new iPhones & iPads high resolution screen, the game play experience is now much better.

- Addicting single player mode
- Battle-mode with 2 players via bluetooth or one device
- GameCenter support
- beautifully designed theme
- Portrait & Landscape modes
- iOS 8, iPhone 6, 6+ support


How to play:

The Hangman is a game where you have to find the word correctly selecting the letters, being careful not to make many mistakes.
